class.name: Phaser.Utils.Debug

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

class.help:
A collection of methods for displaying debug information about game objects.
If your game is running in WebGL then Debug will create a Sprite that is placed at the top of the Stage display list and bind a canvas texture
to it, which must be uploaded every frame. Be advised: this is expenive.
If your game is using a Canvas renderer then the debug information is literally drawn on the top of the active game canvas and no Sprite is used.

public.name: body
public.help: Render a Sprites Physics body if it has one set. Note this only works for Arcade and\nNinja (AABB, circle only) Physics.\nTo display a P2 body you should enable debug mode on the body when creating it.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The sprite whos body will be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

parameters.name: filled
parameters.help: Render the objected as a filled (default, true) or a stroked (false)

public.name: bodyInfo
public.help: Render a Sprites Physic Body information.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The sprite to be rendered.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: box2dBody
public.help: Renders 'debug draw' data for the given Box2D body.\nThis uses the standard debug drawing feature of Box2D, so colors will be decided by the Box2D engine.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The sprite whos body will be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: box2dWorld
public.help: Renders 'debug draw' data for the Box2D world if it exists.\nThis uses the standard debug drawing feature of Box2D, so colors will be decided by\nthe Box2D engine.

public.name: cameraInfo
public.help: Render camera information including dimensions and location.

parameters.name: camera
parameters.help: The Phaser.Camera to show the debug information for.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: geom
public.help: Renders a Rectangle.

parameters.name: object
parameters.help: The geometry object to render.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: Color of the debug info to be rendered (format is css color string).

parameters.name: filled
parameters.help: Render the objected as a filled (default, true) or a stroked (false)

public.name: inputInfo
public.help: Render debug information about the Input object.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: key
public.help: Renders Phaser.Key object information.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The Key to render the information for.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: lineInfo
public.help: Renders Line information in the given color.

parameters.name: line
parameters.help: The Line to display the data for.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: pixel
public.help: Renders a single pixel at the given size.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the pixel to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the pixel to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: Color of the pixel (format is css color string).

parameters.name: size
parameters.help: The 'size' to render the pixel at.

public.name: pointer
public.help: Renders the Pointer.circle object onto the stage in green if down or red if up along with debug text.

parameters.name: pointer
parameters.help: The Pointer you wish to display.

parameters.name: hideIfUp
parameters.help: Doesn't render the circle if the pointer is up.

parameters.name: downColor
parameters.help: The color the circle is rendered in if down.

parameters.name: upColor
parameters.help: The color the circle is rendered in if up (and hideIfUp is false).

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: preUpdate
public.help: Internal method that clears the canvas (if a Sprite) ready for a new debug session.

public.name: quadTree
public.help: Visually renders a QuadTree to the display.

parameters.name: quadtree
parameters.help: The quadtree to render.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: The color of the lines in the quadtree.

public.name: reset
public.help: Clears the Debug canvas.

public.name: ropeSegments
public.help: Renders the Rope's segments. Note: This is really expensive as it has to calculate new segments everytime you call it

parameters.name: rope
parameters.help: The rope to display the segments of.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: Color of the debug info to be rendered (format is css color string).

parameters.name: filled
parameters.help: Render the rectangle as a fillRect (default, true) or a strokeRect (false)

public.name: soundInfo
public.help: Render Sound information, including decoded state, duration, volume and more.

parameters.name: sound
parameters.help: The sound object to debug.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: spriteBounds
public.help: Renders the Sprites bounds. Note: This is really expensive as it has to calculate the bounds every time you call it!

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The sprite to display the bounds of.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: Color of the debug info to be rendered (format is css color string).

parameters.name: filled
parameters.help: Render the rectangle as a fillRect (default, true) or a strokeRect (false)

public.name: spriteCoords
public.help: Renders the sprite coordinates in local, positional and world space.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The sprite to display the coordinates for.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: spriteInfo
public.help: Render debug infos (including name, bounds info, position and some other properties) about the Sprite.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The Sprite to display the information of.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: spriteInputInfo
public.help: Render Sprite Input Debug information.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.help: The sprite to display the input data for.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: color of the debug info to be rendered. (format is css color string).

public.name: text
public.help: Render a string of text.

parameters.name: text
parameters.help: The line of text to draw.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color

parameters.help: The font of text to draw.

public.name: timer
public.help: Render Timer information.

parameters.name: timer
parameters.help: The Phaser.Timer to show the debug information for.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: X position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: Y position of the debug info to be rendered.

parameters.name: color

protected.name: boot
protected.help: Internal method that boots the debug displayer.

protected.name: line
protected.help: Internal method that outputs a single line of text split over as many columns as needed, one per parameter.

protected.name: start
protected.help: Internal method that resets and starts the debug output values.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The X value the debug info will start from.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The Y value the debug info will start from.

parameters.name: color
parameters.help: The color the debug text will drawn in.

parameters.name: columnWidth
parameters.help: The spacing between columns.

protected.name: stop
protected.help: Internal method that stops the debug output.

public.name: canvas
public.inlineHelp: The canvas to which this BitmapData draws.

public.name: currentAlpha
public.inlineHelp: The current alpha the debug information will be rendered at.

public.name: currentX
public.inlineHelp: The current X position the debug information will be rendered at.

public.name: currentY
public.inlineHelp: The current Y position the debug information will be rendered at.

public.name: font
public.inlineHelp: The font that the debug information is rendered in.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running Game.

public.name: lineHeight
public.inlineHelp: The line height between the debug text.

public.name: renderShadow
public.inlineHelp: Should the text be rendered with a slight shadow? Makes it easier to read on different types of background.

public.name: sprite
public.inlineHelp: If debugging in WebGL mode we need this.
